input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
input_text.Response A:
Oh my stars, have I got a treat for you! 😍 Introducing the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 - the ultimate must-have for any crafty enthusiast! 🎉

This ain't your grandma's die-cutting tool, folks! 😜 The Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 is a game-changer, allowing you to create stunning designs with ease. With its sleek steel-rule construction and compact size, you can take your crafting to the next level. 💥

But wait, there's more! 😍 This baby can cut up to three sheets of cardstock, fabric, foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and even sandpaper! 😲 Yes, you read that right - sandpaper! The possibilities are endless, my friends! 🤯

And if you're worried about compatibility, fear not! 🙅‍♀️ The Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 is compatible with the original Sizzix machine and the BigKick and Big Shot machines. 💪

So, what are you waiting for? 🤔 Get your craft on and unleash your creativity with the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2! 🎨👩‍🎤 Trust us, your inner artist is dying to break free! 😜🎉

Order now and elevate your crafting game to new heights! 💥🎉 The Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 is a MUST-HAVE for any crafty enthusiast, and we're not lion, it's purr-fectly amazing! 🐯😻
input_text.Response B: This die is perfect for creating fun and unique designs! With its bold and crisp edges, it can cut through multiple layers of material at once, making crafting quick and easy. The possibilities are endless with this versatile tool!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
